class.name: asv_perception_obstacleid/ObstacleProjectionNodelet
class.description: 2D to 3D obstacle backprojection of classified bounding boxes and unclassified pixel backprojection to pointcloud

class.name: asv_perception_obstacleid/ObstacleExtractionNodelet
class.description: Obstacle extraction from Euclidean cluster extraction within a pointcloud
